RESIDENT.raw_line: Here we have a 25-30 year-old-male, no I.D., no medical history. Fished the guy out of the river with burns covering over forty percent of his body. With a sharp practiced motion, he plucks out the pin.Of course, there are serious emotional side effects to this operation.
